string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?!

#b#p2101012##k lives outside #b#m260000000##k. He claims to be a member of the Sand Bandits, the secret organization in #m260000000#. If he's a Sand Bandit, then he's helping the people. What can you do to aid him?
#p2101012# says he needs Poisoned Needles to steal a treasure from the queen, and asked you to collect #b#t4000330#s#k for him. \n\n#i4000330# #t4000330# #b#c4000330##k/50
You gave #p2101012# all the #t4000330#s required for the Poisoned Needles. The Sand Bandits require a lot of stuff to help everyone.
쉿. 목소리를 낮추시오. 당신은 전에 #t4000330#를 구해준 그 사람이군... 전에는 무척 고마웠소. 당신이 구해준 덕분에 독침바늘을 많이 만들 수 있었지. 후후후...
하지만 아직 왕비의 보물을 탈취하기에는 장비가 좀 부족하군. 튼튼한 밧줄이 있으면 일이 수월해질 것 같은데... 당신이 밧줄 구하는 것을 도와줄 수는 없겠소? 모래그림단을 돕는 일이잖소.
후후후... 사막에서는 밧줄을 #t4000329#로 만든다오. 카투스를 잡아 #t4000329#를 구해 주시오. 50개 정도면 충분할 것 같소. 그럼, 기다리겠소.
흠. 일이 귀찮아진 거요? 그렇다면 옆으로 좀 가주시오. 사람들 눈에 띄어서 좋을 게 없으니까...
Shush! Lower your voice. You're the one that got me the #t4000329#s the other day... Thanks to you, I was able to make some rope. It should prove very profitable…for the people of Ariant, of course.
Honestly, though, our work isn't done. The transport group will be guarded, you see, and to defeat the guards, we'll need Poison Needles. Can you help? It's for the Sand Bandits, remember.
Haha, I knew you'd agree. To make Poisoned Needles, we just need #b#t4000330#s#k since I already have the poison. You can get them from #r#o2100103#s#k, so get me around #b50#k.
Really? You're not willing to help the Sand Bandits? I'm shocked! You are about that?
You brought the #t4000330#s. This should be more than enough for the Poisoned Needles. As a member of the Sand Bandits, I thank you deeply.
We Sand Bandits have a lot on our plates. If people like you didn't help us out, then we'd definitely be struggling.
You don't have #b50 #t4000330#s#k yet. All you need to do to get it is defeat #r#o2100103#s#k. This is for Sand Bandits. Please work harder.
